de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.persistent
Class PageFile<P extends Page<P>>

java.lang.Object
  de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.persistent.PageFile<P>
Type Parameters:
P - Page type
All Implemented Interfaces:
CachedFile<P>
Direct Known Subclasses:
MemoryPageFile, OnDiskArrayPageFile, PersistentPageFile
public abstract class PageFile<P extends Page<P>>
extends Object
implements CachedFile<P>

Abstract class implementing general methods of a PageFile. A PageFile stores objects that implement the Page interface.

Author:
Elke Achtert

writePage

public final int writePage(P page)
Writes a page into this file. The method tests if the page has already an id, otherwise a new id is assigned and returned.

Parameters:

the id of the page
